name: PeopleStrat Consulting
description: Peoplestrat consulting helps you Plan, Design and Execute People Strategy for your biggest Human Capital challenges.We are a high impact HR Consulting and Solutions provider to help you with all your talent related requirements, to enhance your organizational growth.
features: Provide service from startup to unicorn
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Your HR partner for sucess
ShortDescription: We are one of Indonesia’s leading workforce solutions providers
enhanced_description: PeopleStrat Consulting is an HR consulting and solutions provider based in Jakarta, Indonesia. They specialize in helping organizations plan, design, and execute effective people strategies to address human capital challenges and meet talent-related requirements, ultimately enhancing organizational growth. Their services are designed to support a wide spectrum of companies, from startups to large enterprises (unicorns), by applying a solution-oriented mindset. A core focus is on improving talent acquisition outcomes, including boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, accelerating the hiring of top talent, and efficiently filling open positions.
competitive_advantages: Provides service from startup to unicorn organizations
scalability_features: Ability to serve diverse company sizes from startups to large enterprises (unicorns)
